title: Milk & Mocha: Our Little Happiness
description: Cozy up with a warm cup of tea and follow the sweet scenes of Milk & Mocha, from the popular webcomic @milkmochabear.Milk and Mocha share their sweet slice-of-life moments in this new collection, including five never-before-seen comics. Milk and Mocha are charming bears with opposite personalities. These uplifting comics remind us of the sweet moments we share with our friends, family, and loved ones.
author: Melani Sie
